channel.title: Ai on BlackPirateX
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on BlackPirateX

item.title: How I Use AI in Studies
item.description: Unlike most Tech youtubers i do not think AI is useless. It is far from being useless. I think these techtubers are so confined to their own little worlds that they lack the imagination of what can be done in other areas of life. Specially for a low skilled person like me it has been useful so far for me. From the last year I have been using ai in different parts of my life.
